title: Sale or disposition of vehicle
context: [ยง290-23] Sale or disposition of vehicle. When a vehicle is abandoned, the owner of the vehicle repair business, or the owner&rsquo;s authorized representative, after one public advertisement in a newspaper of general circulation in the State, may negotiate a sale of the vehicle or dispose of it as junk. [L 1969, c 178, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985]
